author: Staff Reporter
text:
Five men, including two medical college students, were killed in road accidents in the city, suburbs and Kancheepuram district in one day.

Mathubalamurali of Kerala and Rahul of Karur district, studying in a private medical college in Puducherry, were killed early on Wednesday after the motorcycle they were riding rammed a tree.

Another motorcyclist Udhayaraj died near Anna Nagar on Wednesday.

A pedestrian at Thoraipakkam signal was hit by a us. on Rajiv Gandhi Salai died after he was hit by a private bus.

A 27-year-old motorcyclist died on the spot after he was hit by a lorry on Chennai Bypass on Tuesday night.

The students of themedical college were on a motorcycle which rammed a tree
title: Five die in accidents
